snippet.name: Interceptor
snippet.starttext:
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------- Author : $${Author} Date : $${DATE} Description : $${Interceptor Description}
Modification History:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------> <cfcomponent name="$${Interceptor Name}" hint="$${Hint}" extends="coldbox.system.interceptor" output="false" autowire="$${Autowire:false|true}">
<!------------------------------------------- PUBLIC ------------------------------------------->
<cffunction name="configure" access="public" returntype="void" output="false" hint="Configure your interceptor">
</cffunction>
<!------------------------------------------- PRIVATE ------------------------------------------->
</cfcomponent>
